answers.answer: Thanks and I wish every one the best and safe deliveries
Thanks and I wish every one the best and safe deliveries
You are getting there! Its so exciting. Question, how did ur twins do being born then? Weights and any nicu time? I'm 34/1 weeks with twin girls!
I had my twins at 34weeks also! Now I'm 34 +5 with this pregnancy

Yay!! We are getting so close! Everyone keeps saying oh you still have a ways to go. I'm like no not at all!! I'm also 30wks tomorrow and I have my growth scan tomorrow.. idk if this is the normal time they do it my doc said something like well we might as well do a growth scan next time you come in..

@dab 20.. They were boy and girl twin.. Boy weight 4/11 girl weight 4/09,,they was under the lamps to regulate body temps on for 24 hours.. They were on special formula which they had to be tube fed for about 5 days, then after they took them off and I was able to bottle feed.. They were still on heart monitors, but stayed a total of 3 weeks in the nicu.. I had to stay in the hospital also because I developed preeclampsia during my pregnancy, and after my deliver I still had high blood pressure, low iron, and low blood, because I lost alot during the emergency c section where they put me to sleep, and no one was allowed while they delivered them.. Now I have healthy two year old twins!! Best wishes

question: I'm 30 weeks today! 70 days left... Yay!! Baby shower will take place at 35 weeks.. With my last pregnancy which was a twin pregnancy which was delivered at 34/5, I have my last monthly appointment march 22, then I'll be going biweekly.. I forgot when they do a growth scan because my twin pregnancy was high risk, so I'll have to ask..
title: im getting nervous!!
